titles.title: A resolution recognizing the University of Southern Mississippi for 100 years of service and excellence in higher education.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
3/26/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the University of Southern Mississippi, in Hattiesburg, Mississippi, for 100 years of service and excellence in higher education.
Shares this commemorative occasion with the administration, faculty, students, and alumni of the school.
